code: import React from"react";import"./CardView.scss";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const CardView=_ref=>{let{products,onEdit}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"card-view",children:products.map(product=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"product-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card-header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"product-title",children:product.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"category-badge",children:product.category})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card-body",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"price-section",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"price-label",children:"Price"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"price",children:["$",product.price.toFixed(2)]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"stock-section",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"stock-label",children:"Stock"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"stock ".concat(product.stock===0?"out-of-stock":product.stock<20?"low-stock":""),children:[product.stock," units"]})]}),product.description&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"description",children:product.description})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"card-footer",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn-edit",onClick:()=>onEdit(product),children:"Edit Product"})})]},product.id))});};export default CardView;
